__e: (Whispering) I was thinking, we got an anniversary coming up, I was wondering what kind of present you wanted.
[Mary] It was their 17th wedding anniversary, and I just would have never given a second thought to not being safe.
But tomorrow's our anniversary, and I just can't bear the thought of spending it without you.
We'll do it now because it's our wedding day.
And maybe since it's our anniversary, I was wondering if maybe you wouldn't like to try again?
I cannot believe this is actually my wedding day.
Considering that you didn't have the time to come to our anniversary party.
No. I don't wanna find a way to get married on my wedding day.
He thought about telling his new wife that he loved her, but he didn't want to risk ruining his wedding day.
